Animations/Springs.title: Springs
Animations/Springs.description: As a UI designer, it's important to make your UI reactive, in the sense that it feels nice when the user interacts with it.

Animations/Tweens.title: Tweens
Animations/Tweens.description: Tweens are basically a drop-in replacement for TweenService tweens. (Basically the same as Springs, but without velocity)

GettingStarted.title: Getting Started
GettingStarted.description: Install Quark by going to the

New.title: New
New.description: Creating UI objects (or objects in general) has never been easier.

PremadeUI.title: Premade UI
PremadeUI.description: If you have UI made by someone else, you can still use it using Quark.

Reactivity.title: Reactivity
Reactivity.description: As in most reactive UI libraries, there are objects which can be changed and you have the ability to connect to them, or update properties instantly when they are changed.

Scopes.title: Scopes
Scopes.description: A scope can be thought of as a sandboxed environment where a copy of the original Quark module is created.

Stories.title: Stories
Stories.description: For all those who don't know what a story is:

StyleSheets.title: StyleSheets
StyleSheets.description: If you've ever done web-dev before, you must know what CSS is. (Cascading Style Sheets).
